existing_features.title: Remove duplicate sentences from the StartJourneyScreen component so each piece of information appears only once
Change the road image transition timing in AnimatedTravelFallback from the current interval to 20 seconds per image
Add audio/sound effects for all interactive elements and transitions throughout the entire journey experience where audio is currently missing
After the break point arrival overlay is dismissed, show the road traveling scene again with click-anywhere interaction before proceeding to the halt issue part
After the halt issue quiz overlay is resolved, show the road traveling scene again with click-anywhere interaction before reaching the final campfire destination

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove duplicate sentences on first page
Slow down road image transitions to 20 seconds each
Show road after breakpoint part with click-anywhere interaction
Show road after issue part with click-anywhere to reach campfire destination

projectName: Fix duplicate text, slow down road transitions, add comprehensive audio, restore road scenes after breakpoint and issue
